prompts: Create a cute, furry Pokemon that resembles a small mammal and has large ears.
I want a playful Pokemon that can be found in forest environments, with a round body and a fluffy tail.
Generate a Pokemon that loves to scurry around, showcasing brown fur and pink accents.
Make a tiny, agile Pokemon that resembles a raccoon and has bright eyes.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings, with a sleek, smooth body and a curious personality.
Design a Pokemon with distinctive stripes and a friendly demeanor, perfect for a grassland habitat.
Show me a Pokemon that is small and energetic, with a focus on exploration and agility.
